verses.verse: It happened, <WH1732> when David and his men <WH582> had come <WH935> to Ziklag <WH6860> on the third <WH7992> day, <WH3117> that the Amalekites <WH6003> had made a raid <WH6584> on the South, <WH5045> and on Ziklag, <WH6860> and had struck <WH5221> Ziklag, <WH6860> and burned <WH8313> it with fire, <WH784>
